name: Escape the Cat Party
description:
You are a cat and you went to a party to have fun. But unfortunately, everybody is sleeping or drinking and you are alone, not having fun. Bored. So your goal is to escape this stupid party. The only problem is that the others really seem to have fun, and they don't want you to leave them alone. Your only choice is to try to avoid them seeing you, and that won't be an easy task.

There are some trophies hidden in the house, they are useless and nobody cares about them. But I'm sure the hardcore gamer you are will have to collect them. ;)

Controls: WASD or ZQSD or arrows.

I hope you will enjoy this little game, as much as I enjoyed making it! :D

Game made in ten days for the Game Jolt Contest 10. If you have focus problems, be sure to click the window's bar, not the game screen.
